title: Biased Poll
desc:
Post 1981
- Make a prompt that requires a yes or no response.
- Give yourself Biased (P).
- Decide whether responding with yes or responding with no results in them gaining Biased (N).
- Have the host send that prompt to 4 players of your choosing.

- If all 4 gain Biased (N), they each gain 8 **Card Shards** ðŸ”·.
- If none gain Biased (N), draw 8 cards.
